title: 我的世界权限组错误
author: hl6128533
txt_content: 服务器动不动就权限组错误，求破

replies.author: dycfish
replies.txt_content: 具体的看看 看不到也不好说啊 ，你有修改权限组？

replies.author: RaiRinDown
replies.txt_content: 请截图或者复制你的权限组配置

replies.author: 墨黎莫离
replies.txt_content: 直接改权限组配置文件了吧？你不会弄的话还是在游戏里一条一条输入指令吧= =

replies.author: hl6128533
replies.txt_content:
dycfish 发表于 2015-4-20 22:03
具体的看看 看不到也不好说啊 ，你有修改权限组？
没有，有时候打开就自动改了

replies.author: hl6128533
replies.txt_content:
RaiRinDown 发表于 2015-4-21 11:35
请截图或者复制你的权限组配置
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - automessage.receive.default
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.balance
    - essentials.balance.others
    - essentials.balancetop
    - essentials.chat.color
    - essentials.chat.question
    - essentials.chat.shout
    - essentials.compass
    - essentials.depth
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.kit.tools
    - essentials.mail
    - essentials.mail.send
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.nick
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.ping
    - essentials.portal
    - essentials.powertool
    - essentials.protect
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.signs.break.disposal
    - essentials.signs.break.mail
    - essentials.signs.break.protection
    - essentials.signs.break.trade
    - essentials.signs.create.disposal
    - essentials.signs.create.mail
    - essentials.signs.create.protection
    - essentials.signs.create.trade
    - essentials.signs.use.*
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - essentials.worth
    - frameProtect.autoprotect.*
    - frameProtect.info.*
    - frameProtect.place.*
    - frameProtect.protect.*
    - mbr.user.*
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseCommand
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseGui
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.ACROBATICS
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.ARCHERY
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.AXES
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.EXCAVATION
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.FISHING
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.HERBALISM
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.MINING
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.REPAIR
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.SMELTING
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.SWORDS
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.TAMING
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.UNARMED
    - mcMMOStatsGui.UseSkillGui.WOODCUTTING
    - MyPet.custom.skilltree.default
    - MyPet.user.keep.*
    - MyPet.user.leash.*
    - MyPet.user.release
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.find
    - quickshop.use
    - scs.create.buy
    - scs.create.display
    - scs.create.exchange
    - scs.create.sell
    - scs.remove
    - scs.use
    - signcolours.*
    - signedit.edit
    - Signshop.Signs.*
        - plotme.use
        - plotme.use.add
        - plotme.use.remove
        - plotme.use.home
        - chestcommands.command.open
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '&2[居民]&f'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    - essentials.eco.loan
    - mytown.build
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4[服主]&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Criminal:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '&4[罪犯]&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

    - essentials.god

    - essentials.tp

  Admin:

    permissions: []

    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:

      suffix: ''
